author: theweedsthruthetrees
title: Comment on Pete Carroll: DeShawn Shead has possible ACL tear by theweedsthruthetrees
text:
Pete Carroll: DeShawn Shead has possible ACL tear Posted by Mike Florio on January 14, 2017, 8:38 PM EST Getty Images 
The offseason has begun for the Seahawks with a serious injury issue. 
After Saturdayâ€™s loss to the Falcons, coach Pete Carroll said cornerback Deshawn Shead has a possible ACL tear, via multiple reports. 
A full-time starter in 2016 for the first time, Shead exited in the third quarter of a game that started very well for Seattle but that quickly fell apart. 
Undrafted in 2012, Shead is due to become a restricted free agent in March. The injury puts an obvious damper on the extent to which other teams would be interested in signing him. Share this:
